node.name: VJET JavaScript IDE

tag.name: javascript ide jQuery Mobile NodeJs Dojo EcmaScript HTML5 Canvas

node.shortdescription:
VJET is now @ Eclipse!

Updated 3/20/2013

VJET JavaScript IDE is an Eclipse plugin that provides a fully integrated development environment for JavaScript - from authoring, to execution/test, and debugging.

A quick walk through page is available here:
http://prezi.com/f9y2xzu2kol2/vjet-javascript-ide-quick-tour/

If you are switching from the ebayopensource version of VJET you need to read this:
http://wiki.eclipse.org/VJET/SwitchingFromEbayOpenSourceVJET

A few example screen shots
NodeJS support screenshots - http://wiki.eclipse.org/VJET/NodeJS
JQuery examples - http://forum.jquery.com/topic/using-jquery-try-vjet-javascript-ide

To get the library examples to work you need to import the existing projects:
http://wiki.eclipse.org/VJET/Importing_VJET_JavaScript_Type_Libraries

Have a question please see this page:
http://www.eclipse.org/forums/eclipse.vjet
node.body:
VJET is now @ Eclipse!

Updated 3/20/2013

VJET JavaScript IDE is an Eclipse plugin that provides a fully integrated development environment for JavaScript - from authoring, to execution/test, and debugging.

A quick walk through page is available here:
http://prezi.com/f9y2xzu2kol2/vjet-javascript-ide-quick-tour/

If you are switching from the ebayopensource version of VJET you need to read this:
http://wiki.eclipse.org/VJET/SwitchingFromEbayOpenSourceVJET

A few example screen shots
NodeJS support screenshots - http://wiki.eclipse.org/VJET/NodeJS
JQuery examples - http://forum.jquery.com/topic/using-jquery-try-vjet-javascript-ide

To get the library examples to work you need to import the existing projects:
http://wiki.eclipse.org/VJET/Importing_VJET_JavaScript_Type_Libraries
